name: Memories of MC Escher
description:
4000x4000 px png, pure black & white  
By @idesignstuff

This work was the surprising result of combining different toolsets:  Reaction-diffusion, lighting and monte-carlo noise. Various glsl shaders combined within a three.js framework.

The patterns combined with the stark contrast immediately reminded me of drawings of MC Escher. 
Because it's pure monochromatic, no gayscale, not every display may render it correctly until shown at full size.
